article.title: Exelis to Provide Deep Space Surveillance Control System
article.text: Exelis Incorporated, Colorado Springs, Colorado, has been awarded a $10,460,027 modification (P00535) to previously awarded contract F19628-02-C-0010 for the Ground-Based Electro-Optical Deep Space Surveillance (System) Modular Precision Absolute Control System Project. Contractor will provide a Modular Precision Angular Control System prototype, three refurbished mounts and spare motors. Work will be performed at Yoder, Colorado, and is expected to be completed by December 21, 2015. Fiscal 2014 operations and maintenance funds in the amount of $10,460,027 are being obligated at the time of award. The Space and Missile Center, Peterson Air Force Base, Colorado, is the contracting activity (F19628-02-C-0010).
